column1: BIEfIE Boolean Include Emissions from Imported Electricity
This variable is a control lever.  A control lever is neither a policy nor input data.
It is a configuration setting that is used to specify desired model behavior.
This variable is intended to be set once when adapting the model to a particular
country or use case, then left alone.
As a boolean lever, use "0" to cause emissions from the generation of electricity
that is imported into the modeled region to be excluded from emissions totals.
Use "1" to cause emissions from the generation of imported electricity to be
